page.title: 11DEEPING ST.JAMES-LIONS
page.content: This year's annual Deeping Carnival was partly oranised by the Lions.Their float had some characters from Alice In Wonderland on it.The Lions started in 1917.There are branches of the Lions all over the world.They were started by a man called Melvin Jones.He started them because he felt the community needed some help.They are called the Lions because the organisation is as strong and powerful as a lion. There is a branch of the Lions here in Deeping St.James. They have been going for 5 years.Not just anyone can join. You have to have a good record and be male.The meetings are held at the Deeping Stage.There are 9 positions in each branch of the Lions club. The meetings are held on the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month.
